response.original_title: Why is TotalAV slowing down my computer?
response.overview: {{855}}{{535}}{{4580}} If you notice your computer running slower after installing TotalAV, it is usually related to background security processes, real-time scanning, or system optimization features running continuously. Antivirus programs are designed to protect your system, but this can sometimes impact performance, especially on older or low-resource devices.  {{855}}{{535}}{{4580}} Understanding the reasons behind the slowdown can help you decide whether to adjust settings, pause features, or explore other options.  Real-Time Protection and Background Scans  {{855}}{{535}}{{4580}} TotalAV constantly monitors your system to detect threats, which means real-time protection and background scans may consume CPU and memory resources.  {{855}}{{535}}{{4580}} During full system scans or scheduled scans, performance may noticeably decrease until the scan is complete.
